description: This file defines the OrdersProvider class, which manages a list of Order objects for a Flutter application, allowing addition and status updates.

classes.name: OrdersProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class managing a list of user's orders, providing methods to add and update orders.

methods.name: addOrder
methods.description: Adds a new order to the in-memory list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the status of an existing order identified by id and notifies listeners.
